paintballRules: Must be 10 years or older to play. Ages 10 and 11 require a parent on the field
The velocity of markers cannot exceed 300 feet per second
Players are required to "freeze" their opponents when under 20 feet
Paintballs purchased elsewhere are not allowed
paintballWhatToBring: Though we provide a camo suit, we recommend you bring weather appropriate clothes, outdoor shoes or boots, a change of clothes
For payment, we accept Visa, MasterCard, debit cards and cash
